message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate it, but $140 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying. How about $130?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can do $137, which is a bit closer to your target. I think you'll find it's still a great deal!
